mapper.select: select /** AdmTeam.selectByKey */ TEAM_ID, DELT_STS_FLG, PRNT_TEAM_ID, TEAM_NM, CO_CD, TEAM_ST_DT, TEAM_END_DT, TEAM_DESC, TEAM_LVL, ORD_BY_NO, TEAM_CD, TEAM_MGR_ID, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt from ADM_TEAM where 1 = 1 and TEAM_ID = #{teamId}

select /** AdmTeam.selectAll */ TEAM_ID, DELT_STS_FLG, PRNT_TEAM_ID, TEAM_NM, CO_CD, TEAM_ST_DT, TEAM_END_DT, TEAM_DESC, TEAM_LVL, ORD_BY_NO, TEAM_CD, TEAM_MGR_ID, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt from ADM_TEAM
mapper.insert: insert /** AdmTeam.insert */ into ADM_TEAM( TEAM_ID, DELT_STS_FLG, PRNT_TEAM_ID, TEAM_NM, CO_CD, TEAM_DESC, TEAM_LVL, ORD_BY_NO, TEAM_CD, TEAM_MGR_ID, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt ) values( #{teamId}, #{deltStsFlg}, #{prntTeamId}, #{teamNm}, #{coCd}, #{teamDesc}, #{teamLvl}, #{ordByNo}, #{teamCd}, #{teamMgrId}, #{createUser}, sysdate, #{updateUser}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update /** AdmTeam.update */ ADM_TEAM set TEAM_ID = #{teamId}, DELT_STS_FLG = #{deltStsFlg}, PRNT_TEAM_ID = #{prntTeamId}, TEAM_NM = #{teamNm}, CO_CD = #{coCd}, TEAM_ST_DT = #{teamStDt}, TEAM_END_DT = #{teamEndDt}, TEAM_DESC = #{teamDesc}, TEAM_LVL = #{teamLvl}, ORD_BY_NO = #{ordByNo}, TEAM_CD = #{teamCd}, TEAM_MGR_ID = #{teamMgrId}, upd_usr_id = #{updateUser}, upd_dt = sysdate where 1 = 1 and TEAM_ID = #{teamId}

update /** AdmTeam.updateWithMap */ ADM_TEAM set
TEAM_ID = #{teamId},
DELT_STS_FLG = #{deltStsFlg},
PRNT_TEAM_ID = #{prntTeamId},
TEAM_NM = #{teamNm},
CO_CD = #{coCd},
TEAM_ST_DT = #{teamStDt},
TEAM_END_DT = #{teamEndDt},
TEAM_DESC = #{teamDesc},
TEAM_LVL = #{teamLvl},
ORD_BY_NO = #{ordByNo},
TEAM_CD = #{teamCd},
TEAM_MGR_ID = #{teamMgrId},
upd_usr_id = #{updateUser}, upd_dt = sysdate where 1 = 1 and TEAM_ID = #{teamId}
mapper.delete: delete /** AdmTeam.delete */ ADM_TEAM where 1 = 1 and TEAM_ID = #{teamId}
